20101221081255.000|20101221081257.000|CC1|WHO WAS WALKING THREE OF HIS    
20101221081257.000|20101221081300.000|CC1|ALASKAN HUSKIES THAT WERE VERY, 
20101221081300.000|20101221081302.000|CC1|VERY FRIENDLY.                  
20101221081302.000|20101221081303.000|CC1|SO AS YOU MIGHT IMAGINE, THIS IS
20101221081303.000|20101221081304.000|CC1|KIND OF EXCITING FOR THEM, AND  
20101221081304.000|20101221081305.000|CC1|HERE'S WHAT DARYL HAD TO SAY

20101221081306.000|20101221081308.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU SEE WHEN THEY HIT   
20101221081308.000|20101221081313.000|CC1|THE COLD THEY GET REAL TENSED   
20101221081313.000|20101221081315.000|CC1|UP.                             
20101221081315.000|20101221081315.000|CC1|THEIR MUSCLES REALLY START      
20101221081315.000|20101221081316.000|CC1|FIRING, GENERATING HEAT AND THEY
20101221081316.000|20101221081317.000|CC1|WANT TO PULL, PULL, PULL, AND
